name: Toy Car Simulator
description:
Toy Car Simulator is an amazing car simulator game. Drive with remarkable vehicles, collect coins on platforms and roads, ride new cars, complete new missions.

HOW TO PLAY

- Press E to ignite the engine
- Use arrow keys to navigate
- Press N to Select New Vehicle. Vehicle in frame will be selected. Just press E and navigate
- Press L for lights
- Press R for reset vehicle
- Press T for target director
- Press Wheel to open targets and mission. Also know further information
- Press 1, 2, 3 to throw diamonds and coins for missions

Game Features:

- Different Type of Vehicles
- Best Vehicle Physics
- Lovely Graphics
- Quality Game Sounds

Gamebread "Live to Play"
